teststorydesc: A 66 year old female, Helen Barrett, comes to a clinic for a physical. A clinic staff member collects basic patient demographic information including name, date of birth and sex. The patient reports that she received a Zoster vaccination at a local pharmacy on her 65th birthday. The clinic staff determine that no further vaccinations are required. A clinician, Lily Jackson (ID 7824) enters the historical data into the EHR and transmits it to the IIS.
testObjectives: Support for Sending Responsible Organization (MSH-22) and Receiving Responsible Organization (MSH-23).
notes: Tester should refer to the Message Content tab for expected elements needed to be valued in MSH-22 and MSH-23. Examples values are provided.
